Class FilterChain

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.FilterChain
Direct Known Subclasses:
AudioSimpleFilterChain, VideoSimpleFilterChain
public class FilterChain extends Object
This class handles the implementation of the filter chain.

    filterList
    The list of filters to be used in this filter chain.
